data.text: “#Privateequity companies could solve this in one fell swoop,” says @MariaEDurazo of the industry that owns 1/3 of all hotel rooms in N America. Hotel & restaurant work generates the highest rate of sexual harassment reports #metoo
.@MariaEDurazo says to even enforce the laws we already have  against workplace sexual harassment & assault, we need a lot more people empowered to do so #UnionStrong #believewomen

Katherine Spillar of @MsMagazine & @FemMajority suggests more solutions to workplace sexual harassment & assault, including ending gender segregation in jobs and extending all protections offered to employees to independent contractors. #TimesUp #gigeconomy

Our own VP @MariaEDurazo offers 3 solutions to workplace sexual harassment & assault

1️⃣ Legislation, like I-124 in Seattle & #HandsOffPantsOn in Chicago 

2️⃣ Immigration reform

3️⃣ Unionization 

#UnionStrong
